org.openscience.cdk.tools

Interface IDeduceBondOrderTool

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AtomTypeAwareSaturationChecker, SaturationChecker, SmilesValencyChecker

    public interface IDeduceBondOrderTool
    A common interface for tools that deduce bond orders from connectivity and optionally additional information, like number of implicit or explicit hydrogens, or hybridization states.
    Author:
    Egon Willighagen
    Source code:
    master
    Belongs to CDK module:
    valencycheck
    Created on:
    2006-08-16
